sn52.8:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anuruddho savatthiyam viharati salalagare.
sn52.8:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma anuruddho bhikkhu amantesi …pe… etadavoca:
sn52.8:1.3: “seyyathapi, avuso, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara.
sn52.8:1.5: ‘mayam imam ganganadim pacchaninnam karissama pacchaponam pacchapabbharan’ti.
sn52.8:1.6: Tam kim mannathavuso, api nu so mahajanakayo ganganadim pacchaninnam kareyya pacchaponam pacchapabbharan”ti?
sn52.8:1.10: Sa na sukara pacchaninnam katum pacchaponam pacchapabbharam.
sn52.8:1.11: Yavadeva ca pana so mahajanakayo kilamathassa vighatassa bhagi assa”ti.
sn52.8:2.1: “Evameva kho, avuso, bhikkhum cattaro satipatthane bhaventam cattaro satipatthane bahulikarontam rajano va rajamahamatta va mitta va amacca va nati va salohita va bhogehi abhihatthum pavareyyum:
sn52.8:2.2: ‘ehambho purisa, kim te ime kasava anudahanti?
sn52.8:2.4: Ehi hinayavattitva bhoge ca bhunjassu punnani ca karohi’ti.
sn52.8:3.1: So vata, avuso, bhikkhu cattaro satipatthane bhavento cattaro satipatthane bahulikaronto sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
sn52.8:3.3: Yanhi tam, avuso, cittam digharattam vivekaninnam vivekaponam vivekapabbharam tam vata hinayavattissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
sn52.8:3.4: Kathancavuso, bhikkhu cattaro satipatthane bhaveti, cattaro satipatthane bahulikarotiti?
sn52.8:3.8: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.8:3.9: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu cattaro satipatthane bhaveti, cattaro satipatthane bahulikaroti”ti.
